# Xtract Universal HelpCenter

> Optimal data flow between SAP and databases, BI or cloud solutions â€“ stable and fully automated. Learn how to use Xtract Universal by browsing our user documentation, articles and more.

Full: https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/xtract-universal/llms-full.txt

## Getting Started
